structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVIII. IMPOSITION OF MORATORIUM ON EXECUTION OF WATER SUPPLY CONTRACTS

text.section:
Sec. 2-351. Compliance with administrative order required.
Any administrative order issued pursuant to shall be complied with by all Miami-Dade County departments, Boards, agencies, authorities, personnel and said utilities, and shall be effective until reversed, modified or superseded by order of the Board of County Commissioners.
